Entries.divorced: I thought we made a good team... I guess I was wrong.$s
Entries.Mon8: You know, I used to want fame and fortune, but lately I've been starting to sing a different tune. In the end it's the humble little things that satisfy, don't you think?#$e#I'd still like to go pro, but it's not the most important thing in the world.
Entries.Sat10: I'm having a hard time focusing on exercise lately. Staying in shape is important to me, but there's so much else I want to see and do.#$e#I think it's all about finding a balance!$h
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hey, @. Could you do me a favor?#$b#If you see Haley, tell her I'll be a little late. I want to run some errands for my grandma so she can stay out of the cold.
Entries.event_box3: ...Thanks, @. That actually does help. You've become my best friend in the whole town.#$b#I'm glad I know you. Is that embarrassing to say?$l
Entries.NPC.cs.3985: I heard you gave someone a gift today.#$e#You're a great friend!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.4425: Life sure is different since we've been {{RelationshipLabel}}...$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4001: My old coach hooked me up with that fruit!$h#$b#It's my way of saying thank you for being in my life. I'm so much happier and more secure about myself since I met you.#$b#I used to think that I unless I lived up to some impossible ideal, no one would care about or respect me.$s#$b#But you helped me see that those expectations were all in my own head.#$b#The people who matter won't think less of me if I'm not famous, or don't have a perfect body, or if I talk about my feelings sometimes.#$b#So, even though I still feel a little sappy admitting stuff like this... I love you, @. You're my best friend for life.$l

Changes.Logname: Alex bouquet reactions, love portraits true

Entries.breakUp: You're giving me wha...?$7#$b#*huff*... Well, you've made your choice. I'm not five, I'm not gonna beg you to be my friend.$a
Entries.NPC.cs.3962: You really want to be close friends? I was worried I blew it with my first impression... What a relief!$h#$e#Flowers don't really fit into my image, but I don't care about that right now!$h
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: You want to be better friends with me? Who wouldn't!$h#$e#But uh, seriously, I would like that. This actually means a lot to me.$l

Changes.LogName: Alex pendant and bracelet proposal acceptance

Entries.Alex_Engaged: ...!!! You really want to spend our lives together? As {{RelationshipLabel}}? Yes!!!!$h#$b#That was a 'yes' like 'I'm PUMPED', but I'm also SAYING yes... haha, you know what I mean!$h#$b#In the valley, we celebrate pacts like this the same way as weddings. I'll set everything up. We'll have the commitment ceremony in 3 days, okay?
Entries.Alex_EngagedRoommate: ...!!! You really want to spend our lives together? As {{RelationshipLabel}}? Yes!!!!$h#$b#That was a 'yes' like 'I'm PUMPED', but I'm also SAYING yes... haha, you know what I mean!$h#$b#I need some time to pack up my things. I'll be there in 3 days, okay?

Entries.Wed_roommate_Alex: Alex explained your relationship to me... '{{RelationshipLabel}},' right?#$e#In my day you were either married or you weren't, but times change. You're part of the family, now.
Entries.Wed10_roommate_Alex: You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.
Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: Alex explained your relationship to me... '{{RelationshipLabel}},' right?#$e#In my day you were either married or you weren't, but times change. You're part of the family, now.
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.
Entries.NPC.cs.3966: Move in? So you think my wife and I are too frail to live on our own? Hmph!
Entries.NPC.cs.3968: Move in? So you think my wife and I are too frail to live can't live on our own? Hmph!

Entries.NPC.cs.3965: Did you forget you already gave me one of these? I've taken some hits to the head playing sports, so I know what that's like.
Entries.NPC.cs.3966: ...I don't get it? I already said yes to being {{RelationshipLabel}}.
Entries.NPC.cs.3968: I think one pendant is enough. If I had two, they'd bang together when I do pull-ups.$h

Entries.NPC.cs.3965: I'm sorry, dear, I think I must have misheard you.$2
Entries.NPC.cs.3966: Move in with you and Alex? That's very kind of you, but George and I want to stay independent for as long as we can.
Entries.NPC.cs.3967: I'm sorry, dear, I think I must have misheard you.$2
Entries.NPC.cs.3968: Move in with you and Alex? That's very kind of you, but George and I want to stay independent for as long as we can.

Entries.Alex_spouse: What am I thankful for? Getting to spend my life with a friend like you.$l
What am I thankful for? Getting to spend my life with a friend like you.$h

Entries.Alex0: @, this is the greatest thing that could have happened.$l#$e#I can't wait.$h
Entries.Alex1: I'm going to love being a farmer.$h

Entries.Game1.cs.2782: That was the best ceremony ever.$h#$e#I'm stoked to get to work on the farm!$h

Changes.LogName: Alex roommate stardop speech, love portraits

Entries.Krobus_Stardrop: My old coach hooked me up with that fruit!$h#$b#It's my way of saying thank you for being in my life. I'm so much happier and more secure about myself since I met you.#$b#I used to think that I unless I lived up to some impossible ideal, no one would care about or respect me.$s#$b#But you helped me see that those expectations were all in my own head.#$b#The people who matter won't think less of me if I'm not famous, or don't have a perfect body, or if I talk about my feelings sometimes.#$b#So, even though I still feel a little sappy admitting stuff like this... I love you, @. You're my best friend for life.$l

Changes.LogName: Alex roommate stardop speech, no love portraits

Entries.Krobus_Stardrop: My old coach hooked me up with that fruit!$h#$b#It's my way of saying thank you for being in my life. I'm so much happier and more secure about myself since I met you.#$b#I used to think that I unless I lived up to some impossible ideal, no one would care about or respect me.$s#$b#But you helped me see that those expectations were all in my own head.#$b#The people who matter won't think less of me if I'm not famous, or don't have a perfect body, or if I talk about my feelings sometimes.#$b#So, even though I still feel a little sappy admitting stuff like this... I love you, @. You're my best friend for life.$h

Entries.Good_0: @... I really care about you. I don't think I say that enough.$l#$e#My dad would say it's 'unmanly' to say those things to your friends. But I'm done listening to him.$a
Entries.Good_1: I'm really happy living on this farm with you. And you make me feel like I deserve that.$l
Entries.winter_1: Make sure you stay warm this winter. I worry about you getting sick.$s

Entries.Good_0: @... I really care about you. I don't think I say that enough.#$e#My dad would say it's 'unmanly' to say those things to your friends. But I'm done listening to him.$a
Entries.Good_1: I'm really happy living on this farm with you. And you make me feel like I deserve that.$h
Entries.winter_1: Make sure you stay warm this winter. I worry about you getting sick.$s

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I think I might start reading books. I need to learn about agriculture so I can help you with the farm!
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay manly... Sorry.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Ahh... there's nothing like a good night's sleep on the farm!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, @! I made you a hot breakfast.[195 210 211]#$e#If you want to get strong, you have to eat like you mean it!
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I'm still getting used to cooking and doing laundry... It's not exactly my favorite, but it's all part of being a good housemate!$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Did you get a haircut or something? You look great today! Maybe it's all that fresh air.$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: Look at us, with our little farm. We make a good team.$h
Entries.OneKid_3: I think I'm really bonding with the kiddo. I'm relieved...I wasn't sure if I'd be a good dad.#$e#I try to follow my mom's example.
Entries.TwoKids_3: I finally have the family life that I missed out on as a kid... thank you.

Entries.winter_28: It's been a great year, @. I'm looking forward to next year!
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Wow, look at those biceps! You're getting ripped from all that farm work.
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: I had to buy a bunch of new shorts. I shrunk my old ones in the laundry...$s

Entries.Indoor_Night_Alex: I feel exhausted... That's a good sign! It means I worked hard enough today.$h
Entries.spouseRoom_Alex: #$c .5#Don't ever let me get lazy. I want to stay in good shape so I can help on the farm!#$e#There's lots of room here to do my exercises. I'm making more progress than ever!

Entries.911526/f Alex 2500/t 1900 2200/n joshMes: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer 5 5 1 Alex 9 5 3 Emily 9 17 2/skippable/showFrame 117/showFrame Alex 39/positionOffset farmer 12 8/positionOffset Alex -12 0/viewport 7 4 true/pause 1000/speak Alex "This is nice... I've never had a sit-down meal here before."/pause 1000/emote Alex 40/speak Alex "Um, anyway... I reserved this room so we could talk...$s"/warp Emily 11 11 true/playSound woodyStep/move Emily 0 -1 0/doAction 11 9/move Emily 0 -3 3/move Emily -4 0 0/move Emily 0 -1 0/speak Emily "I've got a linguini with mushroom cream sauce and a side salad for @... and a grilled steak for Alex."/playSound woodyHit/specificTemporarySprite joshDinner/speak Alex "Thanks."/move Emily 4 0 2/move Emily 0 5 1/move Emily 11 0 1 true/stopMusic/speak Alex "So, what I wanted to say was...$9"/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 600/speak Alex "Well... when we first met, I was really arrogant... But I’ve been thinking about why I acted that way in the first place.$s"/pause 800/speak Alex "I think I felt like... if I wasn’t the best, it would mean my dad was right when he said I was worthless. I could either be this elite athlete or a total failure, you know?$s#$b#But watching you fix up that old farm... using your strength to build things, and grow things, and feed people...$l#$b#It made me realize that I get to decide what success means to me. Playing sports isn’t the only way I can be good at something that matters.#$b#I don’t think Mom would want me to limit myself, either. So I’ve been looking into other careers where physical fitness is important. I never realized how many options I have!$h#$b#I'm not sure what I'll choose yet, but I'm done pinning all my self-worth on one dream. Entries.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "Big play!"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "Score!"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "There we go!"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Atta boy!"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "Hey, @! You made it!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "So... what do you think?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "I've been thinking... You know how I used to want to be a pro athlete someday?#$b#Well, I'm happier living on the farm with you than I ever was chasing that dream!$h#$b#But even though gridball isn't my only focus anymore, it's still a part of my life...#$b#... so I thought it would be cool to have a place where us guys could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room!$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "You did good, son. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Thanks, Grandpa."/pause 500/speak Kent "I'm happy for an excuse to get out of the house, and take my mind off things."/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "Same"/pause 1200/speak Gus "I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!$h#$b#Though maybe not so good for Shane's liver...$s"/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "Hey!"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "It seems the guys have a new Sunday tradition."/pause 1000/message "5,000g well spent!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "Thanks again for the money, @. It was a fun project for me, and all the guys seem happy with it!$h"

Entries.Tue10: Hey. You're lookin' good today!$h#$e#So what's new?
Entries.Fri10: Hey, let me know if you ever want some help with your farmwork.#$e#I've gotta do something that's more than just exercise for its own sake, right?$h
Entries.Sun10: Haley and I always thought we could be the town's 'power couple,' but it was always complicated.#$e#I'd still like to make things work with her. But if that never happens, at least we're still friends.
Entries.summer_Sun10: @, I wonder sometimes whether my mom would be proud of me.$s#$e#I think she'd be happy I found a friend like you. I guess that's something.$l#$e#See you around.$l
Entries.fall_Thu10: @! Hey!$h#$b#Is it cool if we hang out soon?
Entries.fall_Fri10: I really do think Haley and I could have something special together. I just wish she listened to me the way you do.#$e#I feel like I always have to act like a big shot around her. And if I told her how I really feel, she'd just lose interest in me.$s#$e#I guess it's okay to have different people in my life fulfill different emotional needs. I'm glad I have a friend I can open up to.$l
Entries.winter_Tue10: Hey! What's up?$h#$e#Are you bored, too? Hey, we can hang out anytime.

Entries.Tue10: Hey. You're lookin' good today!$h#$e#So what's new?
Entries.Fri10: Hey, let me know if you ever want some help with your farmwork.#$e#I've gotta do something that's more than just exercise for its own sake, right?$h
Entries.Sun10: Haley and I always thought we could be the town's 'power couple,' but it was always complicated.#$e#I'd still like to make things work with her. But if that never happens, at least we're still friends.
Entries.summer_Sun10: @, I wonder sometimes whether my mom would be proud of me.$s#$e#I think she'd be happy I found a friend like you. I guess that's something.#$e#See you around.
Entries.fall_Thu10: @! Hey!$h#$b#Is it cool if we hang out soon?
Entries.fall_Fri10: I really do think Haley and I could have something special together. I just wish she listened to me the way you do.#$e#I feel like I always have to act like a big shot around her. And if I told her how I really feel, she'd just lose interest in me.$s#$e#I guess it's okay to have different people in my life fulfill different emotional needs. I'm glad I have a friend I can open up to.
Entries.winter_Tue10: Hey! What's up?$h#$e#Are you bored, too? Hey, we can hang out anytime.
Entries.winter_Mon10: I think I disagree that high school is the best years of your life.#$b#This year, for one, has been better.$h
Entries.winter_Fri10: @, are your parents proud of you?#$e#Well, here's one guy who's pretty proud of you.$h
Entries.fall_Thu6: I remember the final play of the regional championship game. The score was tied, and we were just ten seconds away from the end.#$b#I saw the leaves go flying around in a gust of wind, and I threw the ball, knowing the wind would knock it to the side a bit.#$b#Zane caught it perfectly and we scored. No overtime.#$e#It was a good feeling, y'know?$h
Entries.summer_Mon10: It's weird. I never really talked about my feelings with many people before I met you.#$e#I feel like I can just be myself.
Entries.fall_Mon10: Tunnelers won again last night! They're having an amazing season this year!$h#$e#Sorry, I am really happy right now.$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: #$c .5#It's a good day to read. I need to learn more about agriculture so I can help you with the farm!#I'm trying to catch up on all the books I was supposed to read in high school. Sometimes they start out boring, but they're actually really good!
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: #$c .5#Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay manly... Sorry.$h#I wonder what it'd be like to stand under a waterfall...?
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: #$c .5#Feels good to stay in good health! We only get one body. Gotta make use of it!$h#Ahh... there's nothing like a good night's sleep on the farm!$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Hey, @! I made you a hot breakfast.[195 210 211]#$e#$c .5#If you want to get strong, you have to eat like you mean it!#Good food, straight from the source! I'm so glad we've got this farm.$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: #$c .5#I'm still getting used to cooking and doing laundry... It's not exactly my favorite, but it's all part of being a good housemate!$h#I got some books from the library that I need to finish before they're due. I want to keep my mind as fit as my body.
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: #$c .5#There's a couple things around the house that I'm going to try and fix today. Don't worry about me, I'm not bored.#Leave the cleaning to me today! I like to think I pull off the look of that one cleaning brand mascot.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: #$c .5#Did you get a haircut or something? You look great today! Maybe it's all that fresh air.$h#Another busy day? I like that you keep as active as you do.
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: #$c .5#If you need some quiet time to yourself, that's okay with me.#Hey, @! Did you push it to the limit today?
Entries.Outdoor_3: #$c .5#Glad I got up in time to see the early morning. It's always the best part of the day, but it's so easy to miss if you sleep in.$h#Look at us, with our little farm. We make a good team.$h
Entries.OneKid_3: #$c .5#I think I'm really bonding with the kiddo.$h#Ahh, little %kid1... you've got a lot of life in front of you, don't ya?$h
Entries.fall_3: I almost forgot, it's salmon season! You know what sounds good?$h#$e#Pan roasted salmon with a lemon butter sauce. And a side of kale and... whatever that grain is. The one that isn't rice.$h

Entries.TwoKids_2: #$c .5#When the kids get bigger, I don't suppose you could spare some of the farm space to make a little gridball field...?$h#Maybe %kid2 will be the first professional gridball player from Pelican Town?$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: #$c .5#I finally have the family life that I missed out on as a kid... thank you.#It'd be great if the kids are into sports. I want to make sure they stay healthy. But I'll support them in any kind of life they choose.

Changes.Logname: Alex aro yes, ace yes, CFD

Entries.winter_28: It's been a great year, @. I'm looking forward to next year!
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: #$c .5#Wow, look at those biceps! You're getting ripped from all that farm work.#Today's a good day to read something. ...Yeah, I've been keeping that going.$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: #$c .5#I had to buy a bunch of new shorts. I shrunk my old ones in the laundry...$s#I feel like my mom can rest at peace, knowing how things have worked out for me. I'm lucky to have you in my life.

Entries.PlayerKilled: none/-100 -100/farmer 20 10 2 Alex 19 10 1 Marlon 18 10 3/skippable/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{2}?"/pause 1000/message " {{TermofEndearment}}, wake up!"/viewport 19 10 true/pause 1500/speak Alex "Hey, are you good to stand? Come on, I'll boost you up."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Alex "Okay, hear this. I was just running laps up in the mountains when I realized that something was pulling me towards the mines.#$b#It was honestly a little creepy, and got me thinking that you might be calling out for me, or something. So I came down here to find you."/pause 1000/speak Marlon "And I simply came along to clear a path for Alex while we brought you back up to the surface.#$b#At first, I was to venture in alone, but he insisted on coming along.#$b#You're blessed to have ended up sharing your life with someone so courageous."/emote Alex 16/pause 500/speak Alex "Oh, it's nothing. Punching a slime here and there isn't much of a workout, though I totally see how easy it is to get overwhelmed.#$b#I guess I'm only courageous when I got someone at my back to prevent that from happening."/pause 1000/speak Marlon "It's in my nature to be frank. I'm simply stating the fact of what I saw. You did well, standing by my side."/pause 500/move Marlon 0 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Marlon 3/speak Marlon "At any rate, it's best to leave for now. @ needs to rest and recuperate. You two shouldn't linger."/pause 500/textAboveHead Marlon "Farewell."/move Marlon 0 4 0/warp Marlon -100 -100/pause 1500/speak Alex "Hey, let's head on home. Want to jog down the mountain with me?#$b#Oh, wait. You probably shouldn't be exerting yourself right now. You don't look too injured, but let's still be careful.#$b#I'll jog ahead and tidy up so you can crash when you get there. Meet you at home!$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 0/pause 500/minedeath/end dialogue Alex "Hey, welcome back! You're not looking too bad, for someone who was KO'ed a little while ago. Don't worry, it's our secret. And Marlon's.$1#$c 0.7#I'm going to set the example and take it easy tonight. That means you have to take it easy, too, alright?$1#$b#You should eat a snack with protein in it to help your muscles heal. Here, try some of mine.[210 215 223 228 232 243 403 406 651]$1"

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3 Alex 22 8 2/skippable/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{0}?"/pause 1000/message "Easy, now... take it slow."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Hello @, I'm glad you're finally awake.#$b#Someone brought you back here unconscious and badly injured. I had to take you in for emergency surgery!"/speed Alex 5/move Alex 0 3 2/textAboveHead Alex "{0}!"/emote farmer 16/move Alex -1 0 2/faceDirection farmer 1/move Harvey 1 0 3/move Alex 0 1 3/speak Alex "{{TermofEndearment}}, are you okay? I must've beat my personal time running here when I heard you were hurt!$2"/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Alex "Did you almost get eaten by slimes, or something? The risk of that happening is always on my mind.$2#$b#I know you're strong, but things like this make me worry even more for you.$2"/emote Alex 40/pause 1500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/pause 500/speak Harvey "Your condition is much better now, @, but please be more careful next time.$2"/pause 500/speak Harvey "I'll give you two a moment together."/pause 500/move Harvey 0 -4 0/move Harvey -8 0 0 true/move Harvey 0 -1 0/move Harvey -4 0 0/move Harvey 0 -1 0/playSound doorClose/warp Harvey -100 -100/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "You know I'm all about pushing personal limits, but this is just excessive.$2#$b#I don't know what I'd do if I lost you, too, alright?$2#$b#I've had enough of people I love leaving me behind.$2"/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end dialogue Alex "Hey. I jogged back to get the place ready for you to relax. Pushing yourself when you're exhausted won't do you any favors, trust me.#$c 0.7#{{TermofEndearment}}, you look really tired. You really should rest today. Injuries that don't heal all the way can follow you for a long time.#$b#I got you some of this, too. It's full of protein, to help heal your injuries. [237 241 203 204 220 244 272]"

none/-100 -100/farmer 20 12 2 Harvey 21 12 3 Alex 22 8 2/skippable/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{0}?"/pause 1000/message "Easy, now... take it slow."/viewport 20 12 true/pause 1000/speak Harvey "Hello @, I'm glad you're finally awake.#$b#Someone brought you back here unconscious and badly injured. I had to take you in for emergency surgery!"/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Harvey "Your condition is much better now, @, but please be more careful next time.$2"/pause 500/emote Harvey 40/pause 500/faceDirection Harvey 0/faceDirection Harvey 3/pause 500/speak Harvey "You... have a visitor, by the way. They've been here since you went into surgery, and they were just waiting to talk to you.#$b#Just as it's their right to visit, though, it's also your right to refuse visitors. I'm a button-push away, if you need me."/move Harvey 1 0 1/move Harvey 0 -3 0/pause 1000/speak Harvey "@ is ready to see you.#$b#It's not my place to get involved in private matters, but all I ask is that you remember that @ needs rest."/pause 500/speak Alex "Nah, I get it. We don't have much to say to each other anyway.$9"/pause 500/textAboveHead Harvey "Alright. Take care."/move Harvey -7 0 0 true/move Harvey 0 -4 0/warp Harvey -100 -100/move Alex 0 4 3/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 1000/speak Alex "Hey. Harvey really worked a miracle putting you back together, huh. Guess I worried for nothing.$9#$b#Hmm? Of course I'd worry. We may not be {{RelationshipLabel}} anymore, or even friends, but that doesn't mean I want you dead. Who do you think I am?$9#$b#...Sorry. I'm not trying to pick a fight. I'll go.$2"/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Alex "Truth is, I just didn't want you waking up alone from that.$2#$b#You didn't see yourself when you got here. I imagine getting hurt like that wasn't a joyride, so I wanted to stay until you woke up. Just in case.$2#$b#But... you're clearly fine now, so I'll leave you to it. I don't want to talk about any of what happened here later, either. Bye.$2"/pause 500/move Alex 0 -4 0/move Alex -8 0 0/move Alex 0 -3 0/warp Alex -100 -100/emote farmer 28/hospitaldeath/end dialogue Alex "Our friendship is over, @. I came to see you only because I can't forget you, even if...$2#$b#Even if I know that you're not the same person from my memories anymore.$2"

none/-100 -100/farmer 13 33 2 {0} 15 33 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{2}?"/pause 1000/message " {2}, wake up!"/viewport 13 33 clamp true/pause 1000/speak {0} {1}/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/minedeath/end dialogue Alex "Whoa there! @, is that really you? What happened?$7#$b#I'm glad you're okay, but you still look -and smell- like an overcooked steak. It's sort of impressive, actually.$2#$b#Hey, hold on... if you streak some of the ash on your cheek this way... And some of it like this...#$b#Hah. You look like a gridball player like this. Nice face paint!$1"

none/-100 -100/farmer 13 33 2 Leo 15 33 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{2}?"/pause 1000/message " ...!"/playSound parrot_squawk/pause 500/viewport 13 33 clamp true/pause 1000/speak Leo "Oh, you're awake! That's good!#$b#My bird friends found you in the volcano. They say the fire spirits were not happy with you and tried to cook you like food.#$b#But my friends stopped the spirits in time, and brought you here!$1"/emote farmer 16/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Leo "That's right! If my bird friends hadn't found you, the spirits may have eaten you like we eat Golden Walnuts.$1#$b#But my friends say you will be okay. Just be more careful the next time, yeah?"/pause 500/message "I'm going to get a worried look if I go home like this..."/pause 500/emote farmer 40/message "I definitely look worse than I feel, though. That's reassuring."/pause 500/speak Leo "Really, though... Maybe you should wash in the river.#$b#Falling asleep on hot rocks is not good for you. You look like a coconut left too long on the fire.$1"/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 12/minedeath/end dialogue Alex "Whoa there! @, is that really you? What happened?$7#$b#I'm glad you're okay, but you still look -and smell- like an overcooked steak. It's sort of impressive, actually.$2#$b#Hey, hold on... if you streak some of the ash on your cheek this way... And some of it like this...#$b#Hah. You look like a gridball player like this. Nice face paint!$1"

none/-100 -100/farmer 13 33 2 Willy 15 33 3/pause 1500/showFrame 5/message " ...{2}?"/pause 1000/message " {2}, wake up!"/viewport 13 33 clamp true/pause 1000/speak Willy "Are you alright? I found you face-down on the sand here and feared the worst for a moment."/emote farmer 16/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Willy "You should be careful when venturing in that volcano there.#$b#With that boy Leo now gone to Stardew Valley, there's much less chance of anyone finding you if you're hurt.#$b#Ah... Your clothes are singed badly and you're smeared in ash. I hope you don't give your {{PlatonicSocialMenuLabel}} a fright when you return home.$1"/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 0/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/minedeath/end dialogue Alex "Whoa there! @, is that really you? What happened?$7#$b#I'm glad you're okay, but you still look -and smell- like an overcooked steak. It's sort of impressive, actually.$2#$b#Hey, hold on... if you streak some of the ash on your cheek this way... And some of it like this...#$b#Hah. You look like a gridball player like this. Nice face paint!$1"

Entries.marriage_beach: Hey, you alright? You're looking a little burnt. Be careful.$s
Entries.marriage_beach2: Nothing beats hanging out at the beach with you.$l
Entries.marriage_bus4: Hey, @, before you head off I wanted to tell you something.#$b#You're my best friend.$l
Entries.marriage_bus8: Morning, again. Heading out early?#$b#{{Random: %Alex gives you a manly hug. ++ Mind picking up some protein for me if you got the time?$h ++ You look like you're ready to face whatever the day throws at you!$h ++ Have fun today. Not to get sappy, but I'll miss you.$s |inputSeparator=++}}#$b#Well, catch ya later then.
Entries.marriage_dog3: Dusty's been with me for half my life.#$b#I could never bring myself to leave him alone. Same goes for you.$l
Entries.marriage_josh3: Having a good day? I'm sure you got a lot of farmwork done today.#$b#{{Random: Me? I'm just watching over Grandma and Grandpa., I dropped off some groceries today so help yourself to the fridge., %Alex high fives you.}}
Entries.marriage_josh5: I was looking at the photos on the wall there.#$b#{{Random: That's... baby Alex. Don't look at that!$7, We should get our family photo taken again soon.$h, Mom looks just as young as I remember her.$s}}
Entries.marriage_sum7: Haley always stops by my ice cream stand when it opens.$h
Entries.marriage_town5: I can't let myself go and slack off, never. Not when you've been working so hard.#$b#You believed in me, and I have to do the same. Sure, the goal isn't going pro anymore...#$b#...But I've gotta try to keep up with the toughest person I know.$l
Entries.marriage_town6: Ugh, I'm feeling unmotivated today...$s#$b#{{Random: %You give Alex a hug., Maybe you're who I needed to see right now.$l, Maybe I pushed myself too far yesterday...$s}}
Entries.marriage_town8: Hey, @. Catch!$u#$b#%You catch the ball.#$b#{{Random: Heh heh! You've got quick reflexes.$h, Nice one! High five!$h}}
Entries.marriage_tree3: I remember standing here thinking I'd go pro anytime soon and be out of this town.#$b#I'm sort of glad that never happened.$l
Entries.marriage_tree4: It was under this tree that I realized how important you really were to me.$9#$b#Not just that, but like... that it didn't mean we had to be 'in love.' That a friend could mean that much to me.#$b#I sat under here on the night before our commitment ceremony... I couldn't sleep.$s#$b#{{Random: I'm proud to be able to call myself your {{PlatonicSocialMenuLabel}}.$l, Sorry... I'm not good with words. But I know you get me.$l}}
Entries.marriage_tree5: You know, this tree means quite a lot to me.$9#$b#Whenever I was questioning things, like what I wanted out of my life, I'd come here to sort through my thoughts.$s#$b#Usually it was after I'd been talking with you. You helped me rethink a lot of things... I don't know where I'd be without you.$l#$b#E-enough sappy talk. Uh, so what do you want for dinner?$9
Entries.marriage_doctorafter: I've never really liked visiting the doctor. I feel all cramped up in there.$s#$b#I'll be home soon.
Entries.marriage_nm: Think you'll do some deep-sea fishing tonight? Too bad there aren't any salmon down there.$h

Entries.marriage_town3: Wherever my Mom is, I hope she's proud of me.$s#$b#I didn't grow up to be the sports star I wanted to be, but I think I prefer this life more than anything.#$b#I know my Mom would understand.
Entries.marriage_tree: Grandma and Grandpa are getting old...$s#$b#{{Random: But I want to show them they don't have to worry about me anymore, and you've helped me with the first step. ++ I'm gonna miss Grandma's special casserole when she... Forget it.$s ++ They've supported me for most of my life. I wanna do the same now. |inputSeparator=++}}

Changes.Logname: Alex ace yes, aro yes, Immersive Spouses

Entries.marriage_beach4: Looking good, @! {{Random: Maybe it's the sun., You been working out with that sword of yours?, I bet you've got a lot of eyes on you today.}}
Entries.marriage_beach5: My body's always restless during summer.#$b#{{Random: I totally regret not bringing my ball with me today...$s, Maybe I'll go for a swim., This body was built for moving non stop.}}
Entries.marriage_beach7: Hey, I was hoping I'd see you here. You taking a break, or are you here to fish?
Entries.marriage_bh2: @, you here to work out too?$6#$b#Or to relax? That heated pool is awesome for sore muscles.$6
Entries.marriage_bh3: Cheer me on... *huff* I'm this close... *puff* to a new personal best!$6

Entries.spring_Tue8_inlaw_Alex: The best love, romantic or otherwise, is the one that makes you a better person without changing you into someone else.$0#$e#I think you and Alex make great {{RelationshipLabel}}.$1
Entries.summer_Mon8_inlaw_Alex: Communication is the key to a healthy partnership. It's important to share your thoughts and feelings with each other.$0#$b#I don't think you and Alex will have any problems with that.$1

Entries.spring_Tue10_inlaw_Alex: We're all striving to reach some kind of balance in life, an equilibrium of complexity.$0#$e#It looks like having Alex as your {{PlatonicSocialMenuLabel}} was exactly what you needed to find that balance.$1
